recommendations.name: Daniel Silva
recommendations.review: I had the pleasure of mentoring Anirban during his Google Summer of Code (GSoC) internship while we were working on the mobile project at Rocket.Chat. Anirban demonstrated exceptional technical skills, a strong work ethic, and a keen ability to tackle complex challenges. Throughout the GSoC program, Anirban was proactive in learning and applying new concepts, and he consistently delivered high-quality work. His dedication and enthusiasm were evident in every task he undertook, and his contributions significantly advanced our project. Anirbanâ€™s collaborative spirit and problem-solving capabilities make him a valuable asset to any team. I have no doubt that he will continue to excel and make meaningful contributions in his future endeavors. I highly recommend him for any role or opportunity that aligns with his skills and passions.

recommendations.name: Rajdeep Ghosh
recommendations.review: I highly recommend Anirban Paul, with whom I've collaborated on multiple projects. Anirban's expertise in Fullstack and app development is commendable, as he consistently delivers high-quality solutions by seamlessly integrating front-end and back-end technologies. What sets Anirban apart is his remarkable ability to quickly adapt and learn new technologies, making him a valuable asset in dynamic and evolving work environments. His dedication, technical proficiency, and collaborative approach make him an excellent choice for any Fullstack development project.

recommendations.name: Bhushan Pungliya
recommendations.review: I highly recommend Anirban for his dedication, professionalism, and ability to deliver results.
